The game is neck-and-neck. You are distantly aware of the chatter from the screen; the other players are first confused, and then awed. Soon, the game is less and less a match of two teams, but spectators, cheering on their titan.
You see movement out of the corner of your eye. Joey has visibly relaxed. The game is his.
But it doesn't end. Joey merely sits, reclined, with a slight smirk. The voices online begin to demand an end. He's toying with me. You realize.
You set down your controller and extend a fist in his direction.
"Good game"
The smirk disappears from his face and is replaced by a warm smile. He bumps your fist. "You too. Didn't know you had that in you. Let me just mop this up real quick."
As Joey finishes the game, you glance at his glass. It is empty.

"What the hell?"

you glance back at your friend. He is noticeably larger, and is looking at his baggy cargo shorts, which now resemble speedo's on his larger frame. You hear a tearing sound, and suddenly Joey starts growing rapidly. His head hits the ceiling with a thud, and his feet slam against the wall opposite. Your couch is crushed into the floor by your friend's growing body, and his head finally punches through the ceiling. You watch rubble fall down his toned abs. One foot crashes into your game and television, the other begins to deform your wall.

"Dude, what's going on?" you hear--loud but muffled--coming through from the ceiling.
You feel something hit your leg and look down in time to see Joey's hand close around your waist and lift you up. Your house gives way as Joey stands up, covering the two of you in dust. You rub your eyes to clear them and look down. You see the shingles of your roof below you, brushing against Joey's massive shins. Joey shifts his weight, and another part of your house comes crashing down, forming a mound of debris around a giant foot.
1212.title: To 50 Feet Tall

122.content:
After pouring the two glasses, you take a tiny vial of green liquid and pour it into your glass of Coca-Cola, mixing it with a spoon. You take a sip of it and smile as you walk back to Joey and hand him his.

"Hey, thanks!", Joey says to you as you sit down on the couch next to him.

He takes your controller and drops it into your lap.

"Okay little guy, one more round!" He says excitedly as you take a long gulp of your drink, finishing it off. You wipe your mouth and nod to him as he starts the game.

As the game progresses, you start to feel a tingling sensation run up your spine, and you feel light headed as you start to shrink slowly but steadily in your seat. Joey is too entranced by his game to even realize that you are now about half his height, and getting smaller.

He laughs a little as he looks at your side of the screen, seeing that you have stopped playing.

"C'mon man, you gotta at least...woah! What is happening?", He exclaims after looking at you, seeing that you are now about 6 inches tall, starting to slow down in the shrinking process. He picks you up gingerly, looking you over as you seem to stop shrinking at about 4 inches tall. You look up at his huge muscular face looking over you. Blushing slightly, you try to sit up in his palm.

"I-I'm not sure, I guess it was something in my drink...", You say coyly up to him.

He begins to smile as he looks down at you sitting in his huge palm. "Hmm...well, maybe we can make the best of this..."

1323.title: Sien

13231.content:
You waited for Sien after school to walk home with him. It was the start of Summer vacation and your parents were out of town for around a month while Sien's mother didn't mind him staying that long. In fact he's stayed longer before. You stood against the bike rack waiting for him to come through the doors. When you saw the second wave of students burst through he came hurrying out like a salmon going the opposite direction of the stream. His large beautiful mass sent excitement down your spine.

He ran up to you panting and lowering his head as he held his knees, "r-ready?" he asked in his angelic voice and cute accent.

"Yeah, let's go," you both took your bikes and rode to your house. You planned the two weeks perfectly, telling Sien that you had a surprise for him. He was curious, but he loved surprises and couldn't wait to find out what it was.

While you rode you sort of schemed in your mind at what to do. You managed to make two solutions, a shrinking and growing solution for either you or Sien. You found out their capabilities after trying them out on your plants. Every drip of each would halve or double the height of what it was put on. You had a bold smile and light in your eyes at the possibilities. You shrunk in the arms of the kindest friend you ever had. Or him filling up your house with his bulky body. They only thing you worried about was if he didn't like the changes. But, you could always change them back with the other solution. "Vhat ahre vou smilling aht (What are you smiling at)?"

"Sien!"

"Yah?"

"I promise this will be the best summer you'll ever have!"

"Thank vou Zak (Thank you Zac)! I know it vill (I know it will)!" You were happy just hearing his voice s you sped home. When you got there the house was empty, all that was left from your parents was enough food to last you the month in your refrigerator and the deep freezer. As well as a note from your parents. You house was up on a hill leading to the mountains and the forests so if something happened no one would know. No nosy neighbors to interrupt. It was just you and Sien.

You and Sien sat down and played some of your favorite games together and watched tv afterward. He held you close to his chest his fluffy hair gently bouncing and washing over your back. He was already your giant. Your parents and his mother were fine with you two. But now he would always be, or at least till the end of the month. As he held you he tilted back and looked into your eyes. His ocean shimmer were looking into your heart as he smiled warmly. You didn't even notice his lips leave your until you heard them pull away. "Zak, may I tahke a nahp here (Zac, may I take a nap here)?"

"Sure," you pecked him on the cheek again as he lay back against the pillows of your couch and put his feet up in your lap. You took off his shoes and socks for him and got him a blanket to keep him warm. This was how you planned it. On the first day when he stays over he's always sleepy and takes a nap until it was late. "Zak?"

"What is it Sien?" you had just put the blanket on him.

"When vill vou show me yhour surprise (When will you show me your surprise)?"

"When you wake up, I promise."

"Mmm..." he slowly drifted off to sleep. You watched his muscles rise and fall like they always did as he held you when you two slept together.

You slowly walked away into the kitchen and reached into the back of the top shelf of your spice cabinet. Using a chair you reach into the back of the shelf and pull out two large bottles, about a fourth of a gallon each. The purple serum was the growth solution and the green one was the shrinking solution. You again thought of the past two years you've spent together. The first time you defended him from some bullies and from then on his eternal friendship. Helping him learn english, him helping you with math, when he asked you to read him english stories, and when he told you ones from his country. You wanted that to last forever, you thought as you walked to him. You kneeled next to him and slowly uncapped the...

This story is about you around teenaged boys either when they grow to various sizes or when you shrink around them.

It is about BOYS so no female characters are allowed. Please, this is *writing*.com, so it is presumed that you can write in proper English. If you write in lol-speak or your writing is just atrocious, your chapter will be deleted. I prefer my stories to have no bathroom stuff, but if your chapter is well written and fits with the rest of the story, I may consider keeping it. Also, as stated earlier, there will be no giant girls in this story whatsoever. Even if you are the next Hemmingway and you write the most engrossing giantess stories they WILL BE DELETED!
